transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Gopal ji baat kar rahe shubharambh laal ji se.
Executive: Haan namaste.
Executive: Namaste sir aapne IndiaMART mein call kiya tha koi complaint aapko register karne kuch problem aa rahi hai?
Customer: Problem ye aa rahi hai ek number jodna tha.
Executive: Ji bataiye.
Customer: Ek number jodna tha madam.
Executive: Achcha ek number add karna tha yaha pe.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Kiska number tha sir?
Customer: Ek dost ke mobile mein wo application chalana tha.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Download kar liya tha.
Executive: A agar kisi ko agar kisi ko matlab sir main samjhi nahi kisi ko IndiaMART mein subscription lena hai ya aapko number add karna hai? Meri application meri jo meri jo application hai na wo jaise mere mobile mein chal rahi hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Mera ek partner hai uske mobile mein chalana hai wo same to same jaise main chala raha hu waise waise dikhna chahiye.
Executive: To aap to agar aap aisa karenge to jo aapka number ye wala dala hua hai na yaha par jo primary number hai jisse meri baat ho rahi hai 97 hai aur last mein 516 hai theek hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ye number ye number dalwaiye unse login karte time aur fir aapke number pe OTP aayega wo OTP aap unko bata dijiye.
Customer: Kaha kaha pe jodun batao?
Executive: Aap unse boliye ki wo jab IndiaMART open karenge na.
Customer: Ek minute ye mobile mere paas hi hai uska.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Uska mobile mere paas hi hai.
Executive: Haan to unke mobile mein number dalne ke liye aa raha hoga na IndiaMART khologe to.
Customer: Haan haan dekh raha hu main chalu karta hu.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Usme sirf number dalne hai na?
Executive: Usme na aap apna ye wala number dalna jisse meri baat ho rahi hai theek hai?
Customer: Ek minute.

Customer: Uske andar ye bata raha hai madam please use a digit about your company yani ki company name company ye bata raha hai.
Customer: Company name dalna padega kya?
Executive: Company name nahi sir aapke mein kaise aa raha hai mujhe ek bar na ye wala number bataiye jisse meri baat ho rahi hai kya number hai ye?
Customer: 97
Executive: 97
Customer: 72
Executive: 72
Customer: 08
Executive: 08
Customer: 5516
Executive: 5516 haan.
Executive: Ek bar na maine aapko whatsapp pe message kiya hai apne number se aapke number pe theek hai?
Executive: Dekhiye aaya?
Customer: Haan aaya hai.
Executive: Aapke aapke number pe message aaya na aap ek kam karo mujhe wo bhej dijiye screenshot bhejiye aap call pe rahiye aur mujhe screenshot bhejiye kya aa raha hai login karne ke liye.
Customer: Dekho.

Customer: Dekho abhi ye aa raha hai main aapko photo bhejta hu.
Executive: Haan photo bhejiye main dekhti hu.
Customer: Abhi ye aa raha hai main bhej aa gaya tha.
Executive: Sir ye dekho upar jo wo option aa raha hai na teen teen dash jo aa rahe hai bane hue.
Customer: Haan three line three line wala.
Executive: Haan three line pe click kijiye.
Customer: Haan kar diya.
Executive: Waha pe kya kya option aa raha hai ek bar padh ke bataiye ya photo bhej dijiye uska mujhe.
Customer: Haan uska photo bhej raha hu.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Ye lo.

Executive: Abhi dekho wo jo upar aapka high user ke aage pencil ka sign aa raha hai na.
Customer: Kya naam bataya tha?
Executive: High user jo aa raha hai upar number jo dala hua hai 882493 wala theek hai? Haan sabse upar uske bagal mein pencil ka sign aa raha hai?
Customer: Haan us pe click kiya.
Executive: Haan ab kya aa raha hai waha pe abhi?
Customer: Uska photo bhejiye jo aa raha hai.
Executive: Bhej diya.

Executive: Yaha pe isko log out karne ka option nahi aa raha hai?
Customer: Log out karne ka option nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Sir.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Ek bar back kariye.
Customer: Haan haan bataiye.
Executive: Abhi back karne ke baad mein jaha pe aapka wo wapas se teen dash pe jo aapne click kiya tha wo wala page open hua hoga hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Usko niche kariye dekhiye waha pe about IndiaMART ke niche kuch aa raha hai likha hua jo sabse last mein hai about IndiaMART ke niche.
Customer: Three line mein tak ke kya?
Executive: Haan three line pe gaye about IndiaMART hai haan haan about IndiaMART mein gaya uske niche uske niche kuch aa raha hai about IndiaMART ke alawa?
Customer: Haan aa raha hai na.
Executive: Kya aa raha hai? Terms of use aisa naam aa raha hai.
Executive: Photo bhejiye kya aa raha hai?
Customer: Bhej diya.
Executive: Sir ek bar wapas three line pe click kariye.
Customer: Ye jo upar dikhai de rahi hai wo haan haan dekho three line do jagah hai upar wali haan ek to waha pe hai three line do jagah aa rahi hai isme dekho aapko maine photo bheje hai.
Customer: Ek to IndiaMART ke samne hai aur ek us corner mein hai ek right side mein ek left side mein wo three line.
Executive: Nahi nahi upar jo sabse upar aa rahi hai na left side mein us pe jana hai.
Customer: Haan haan kiya kiya.
Executive: Us pe jaiye wapas se theek hai? Haan aur waha jane ke baad mein aapka ye help and support karke option aa raha hai na ek feedback ke niche.
Customer: Kya help support hai?
Executive: Help and support jo aa raha hai us pe click karke photo bhejiye ek bar.
Customer: Bhej diya.
Executive: Ek second yaha kahi bhi log out karne ke liye nahi aa raha hai aapne is number se login kiye hi kyu hai sir aapka is number se login nahi hona hai.
Customer: Madam isko ek bar ek kam karo ye application aap delete kar do.
Executive: Ek bar haan ek bar application uninstall karke install kariye theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aur application install karne ke baad mein na aap karo main call par hi hu.
Customer: Ye uninstall kar diya.
Executive: Haan?
Customer: Uninstall kar diya usko main haan abhi wo dobara download kariye.


Customer: Madam.
Executive: Haan ji ab iske number wo number mang raha hai wo jo mere number dal ye wala ye wala number daliye 9772085516 ye wala daliye.
Customer: Theek hai dal diya.
Executive: Abhi aapke phone pe OTP aaya hoga wo OTP unko bata dijiye.


Customer: Ho gaya open?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ho gaya.
Executive: Ho gaya open?
Customer: Haan ho gaya madam.
Executive: Theek hai sir abhi aapka concern jo tha wo to resolve ho gaya na?
Customer: Haan ab wo mere wale mein aa raha hai na waise waise aa raha hai yaha pe.
Executive: Haan to ab wo open ho gaya hai ab wo use karna chahenge to use kar sakte hai theek hai?

Executive: Sir ye na aapka concern open kiya tha aapne IndiaMART helpline number pe call karke theek hai? To abhi kyuki aapka ye concern resolve ho gaya hai main isko close kar rahi hu.
Customer: Kya kar rahe ho?
Executive: Aapka jo concern open hua tha main isko band kar rahi hu aapke paas feedback ke liye aayega to feedback de dijiyega.
Customer: Okay okay lekin madam ek baat puchu.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Jaise iske andar ye jo order wagera aate hai jo mere list mein jaise Rajasthan ki list dalta hu to wo Rajasthan ki list bolte waise nahi aa raha hai maine home pe bhi dekh liya wahi list pe bhi dekh liya lekin maine dekh liya.
Executive: Uske liye main sir ek bar aap kal available mujhe koi time bataiye jis time aap baat kar paye main aapke sath ek bar video meeting karke dekh lungi jo bhi catalog mein hoga.
Customer: Kal 11 baje.
Executive: Theek hai main kal ek bar na 11 baje aapko call kar leti hu uske liye theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai baki to chal gaya.
Executive: Haan baki aapka ho gaya abhi main aapka concern close kar rahi hu aapke paas feedback aayega feedback de dijiyega.
Customer: Theek hai madam thank you.
Executive: Theek hai thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to run the application on partner's mobile.

- Application not showing Rajasthan list.



Resolution:

- Executive guided to log in with primary number.

- Asked to uninstall and reinstall the application.

- Agreed to schedule a video meeting for list issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call at 11 AM for video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- application, login, video meeting, list
